description: Similarly brutal to &cVindicators&r, &cPiglin Brutes&r defend &2Bastions&r and move fast - dealing &dmassive melee damage&r with their &3Golden Axes&r.
It's &deasy to become overrun&r by fast melee enemies. Taking some out &3from a distance&r helps, but they often incidentally &dhide around corners&r for ambushes.
Like &3Pillaring&r, a more resilient defensive method for dangerous melee enemies is &3ankle biting&r - instead of moving above the danger zone, you move &dbelow it&r.

First &3pillar three blocks&r, then &3break the bottom two&r blocks, &3dig down two blocks&r below it, and &3replacing one block&r above you. This &dblocks entry&r by tall enemies, and allows you to attract them with a bow, then safely &dattack their legs&r.
